Comments
Not a risky campus at all. Extremely safe
A lot to choose from and they are always nice to help you out.
Depends on what you interest is you will find a group pertaining to you.
The fraternities do weird things haha.
Even thought I like the education I don't feel like its 100% worth it.
Not much besides certain events. For the most part you are going to have to go out of campus to have any type of fun.
The food is really good. I like the quesadillas the most or the chicken wrap. They are good!
I don't dorm but I have heard its really boring and the campus is dry.
Very good. I like my classes I have learned a lot out of them and teachers.
Do your schedule early because classes full up really early. Know people so you can know what to take next semester and where to go.

Kean has a good mix of cultures but I do not think the campus is full of friendly and outgoing people because they are hard to find. But, the professors I have gotten have been very good with the exception of one. The campus itself is very beautiful and nice.
pageTitle: Kean University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {148631=Honestly Kean University spends more money on appearance than they do on maintenance. Everyday Fall 2011 Semester workers were out there building & creating new scenery. Cutting the grass, trimming the edges, etc. But when it came to maintaining the residence halls they slacked. The heat had been broken, which took them weeks to fix and the washing machines in Whiteman Hall had been out of order for a week on end. It was just very inconvenient., 184523=I am a transfer student and will be attending Kean University Fall 2012., 311654=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 188449=A lot of fun! Not many people dorm, only like 1000, but there has been a great request lately. A great college experience!}

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Brianna from Piscataway, NJ 03/23/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 9 out of 9 people found this review useful. 3 of 80 Categories Comments Campus Safety We have our own police station on campus and they are always roaming around to make sure that the campus is safe. What to do for fun There's night clubs surrounding us, yes you will have to call a taxi or have a car but it is worth it. We also have an Applebees up the street and if you travel a little bit further we have a plethora of restaurants. We also have Jersey Gardens which we have a shuttle that takes us there and back. We have a pool, tennis court, basketball court, football field, gymnastics rooms and dance rooms. Food and Dining Unfortunately, the food has its highs and lows. The cafeteria that every freshman has to get swipes for is
